# isPaused

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether to run actions, animations, particle systems, and physics simulations in the scene graph.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPaused: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] (the default), SceneKit continuously updates and renders the contents of the scene. Pausing a scene pauses any running animations or actions attached to the scene graph, and suspends updates of the scene’s physics simulation and any particle systems in the scene.
